title: Loot
description: Loot is randomized adventurer gear generated and stored on chain. Stats, images, and other functionality are intentionally omitted for others to interpret. Feel free to use Loot in any way you want.

derivative_projects.title: Realms (for Adventurers)
derivative_projects.description:
There will only ever be 8000 Loot Realms, 1 for each Loot ID. Remaining Realms are available to mint by anyone, even if you don't own Loot! Follow us on twitter for updates!
Every realm has been procedurally generated and is unique down to the language. Each realm has a map showing the regions, cities, rivers and topography that exist in the world. Each realmâ€™s rankings will display the number of regions, cities, rivers, and harbors within the realm. Resource deposits and exclusive Wonders can be found in each realm with varying rarity.

derivative_projects.title: Adventure Gold
derivative_projects.description: Adventure Gold is the native ERC-20 token of the Loot non-fungible token (NFT) project. Loot is a text-based, randomized adventure gear generated and stored on-chain, created by social media network Vine co-founder Dom Hofmann.

derivative_projects.title: Ability Score
derivative_projects.description: Table Top RPG style abilities scores. All generated and stored on chain.

derivative_projects.title: Abstract Loot
derivative_projects.description: Abstract Loot is a collection of generative and animated artworks. This is the first collection designed from the Loot project's metadatas.

derivative_projects.title: Characters
derivative_projects.description:
Characters are randomly generated and stored on chain. They were created as part of the Loot ecosystem. The goal with Characters is to expand the Loot ecosystem with additional possibilities and interactions.
The characters team, alongside other derivative projects are working on elements, games, integrations and engagement possibilities that will combine both Loot and Characters.
Images and other functionalities are intentionally omitted for others to interpret.
Feel free to use Characters in any way you want.

derivative_projects.title: Treasure
derivative_projects.description: Treasure is building decentralized, open source, composable currencies for the NFT ecosystem.
